lines.text: I'll cook the supper. How about scrambled eggs smothered in steak?
Sounds swell to me. Where are the eggs?
On top of the burro, so they'll be nice and fresh in the sun.
Yeah, we'll... get goin' before we starve here. C'mon.
Oh, fresh henfruit. Handle with care.
[tosses eggs to Moe]
A sack of flour comin' down!
[tosses sack of flour down. Moe is forced to drop the eggs to catch the flour]
Ya nitwit, now you broke the eggs!
[Newly hatched chicks are walking around the broken eggs]
So what? We'll have steak smothered in lamb chops... and maybe chicken on the side! Nyuk nyuk nyuk.
Well, you fix it, I've got some prospecting to do. Hand me down that dynamite, and be careful!
I'll handle it as if it were eggs!... I mean, I'll be careful!
One beer!
One beer coming up.
[fills mug and holds it up in the air with one hand]
[throws the mug horizontally to Moe who catches it and puts it on the table]
Draw one!
Draw one!
[fills mug and holds it up in the air with one hand]
Hike! On the way!
[throws the mug to Larry who catches it the wrong way, the contents of the mug fly out onto Moe, getting him soaked]
I'm sorry, Moe.
Don't worry, it was just an accident.
[grabs the beer mug and smashes it on Larry's head]
That was no accident. Who did you think I was, a customer?
[grabs him by the hair]
